Headline: ජනපති ජපානයෙන් අපට අරන් එන තෑග්ග (බ්‍රහස්. කාටූන්)
News Content: ජනපති ජපානයෙන් අපට අරන් එන තෑග්ග (බ්‍රහස්. කාටූන්)

comments.comment: While there are so many ways to develop avenues to earn much needed foreign exchange, one might wonder why DIANA is always chattering about promoting GANJA and PROSTITUTION .The main reason for all the predicaments the country is facing is sending to parliament white robed actors who could make a big noise about typical political issues but could do little for sake of country's long term development.
